title: Steamed Christmas pudding
ingredients: ['200g self-raising flour', '200g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '2 eggs, beaten', '4 tablespoons melted butter', '140g prepared mincemeat', '140g cranberry sauce', '125g pumpkin puree', 'To serve', '250ml container soured cream', '1 (200g) tub cream cheese', '5 tablespoons icing sugar']
